name: Disco Breakout
description:
A simple breakout game with cool music and effects.

Some things to know :

- You can press arrow keys to go left and right.
- You can press F11 for fullscreen
- You can press esc to pause the game, you will have to do it twice if you are in fullscreen.
- If you want to have lower volume you can enter "volume" in password then a number beetween 20 and 70 (less than 20 will start to be inaudible and more than 70 will start to be earrape)
- There are some easter eggs with passwords, good luck to find them :)

Also dont press quit if you are on browser, its made for download version and make the game crash on browser.

Music by Blueberry, he makes some good musics, consider checking his channel if you like SXPRA DRIFT :
SXPRA DRIFT - YouTube
